title.narrative: Kenya - Green Zones Developmemt Support Project
Kenya - Projet de soutien au développement des zones vertes

description.narrative: The project objectives are: To promote forest regeneration and conservation for environmental protection To improve rural livelihoods and incomes of communities living adjacent to the forests.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

title.narrative: Forest cover in gazetted forests increased by Project Year (PY) 6
Increased participating household income increased by beekeeping - NTZDC involvement with the adjacent communities leading to higher household incomes
Increase in natural forest cover in the gazetted forest reserves
Increased participating household income increased by irrigation - NTZDC involvement with the adjacent communities leading to higher household incomes
Enhanced stability of tea belt ecosystem achieved
Increased participating household income increased by fruit trees - NTZDC involvement with the adjacent communities leading to higher household incomes
Increased participating households income - tree cover in farmlands and schools
Increased participating households income - fruit tree cover in adjacent areas and increased household incomes
Improved forest cover in local authority areas
Increased environmental benefits, and enhanced community participation in conservation
Conservation effectiveness of Nyayo Tea Zones Development Corporation (NTZDC) buffer belt increased
Increased income from buffer belt for adjacent communities
Income of forest adjacent communities increased from PY2
Total population benefited - of which women
Enhanced Capacity of Forestry Institutions in forest conservation and management

target.value: Implementation achievements, cost effectiveness and scheduling
